message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CR, cs.NE 

This paper is about training neural networks with robustness guarantees against adversarial attacks. The paper focuses on introducing a framework to bound the adversary-free region in the neighborhood of the input data by a polyhedral envelope, which yields finer-grained certified robustness. This work is related to machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision (cs.CV), cryptography and security (cs.CR), and neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE).
